body:
Hey, I thought of a new idea.

If you subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC2wXVvM8v9XWs_kgO-9TLw
And comment your name on a video then I will give you a shoutout in a montage video.

Thanks for reading and/or subscribing! :D
